edu.ncsu.csc.Galant.graph.component

Class GraphState

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.ncsu.csc.Galant.graph.component.GraphState

  • public class GraphState
extends java.lang.Object
    Stores the current state of the graph for iterating through the animation. Each state corresponds with the next step in the animation.
    Author:
    Michael Owoc
